content.description: Start of the face, and plug gear into horizontal cracks and broken features.  The climb is lower angle, but will keep the beginner trad climber on guard.  Crux is down low.
content.protection: A light trad rack.  Some good horizontals. Cold shuts at the top.
content.location: The route is located immediately left of For Seeking Heat. On the left side of Winter Wall.

content.description: Crux for us was getting off the ground and deciding which side of the mini tree to go on. Continue past a baby roof and onto lower angle dihedral/face climbing.
content.protection: Single rack is plenty. Cold shuts at the top though you can top out in a pinch (just be careful of the very loose rock up top).
content.location: Best I can tell, right side of Winter Wall. Climber's right of the talus field look for two boulder slabs at the base of the climb near a prominent corner.

content.description: Scramble small ledge and climb arête with good holds.
content.protection: Trad rack. Hexes work well with the horizontal placements. Share chains with Hijo Del-Mar.

content.description: Start under small roof 30 feet above: climb easy cracks until you get to the crux handcrack roof, then easy moves to the pine.  Rappel Pine.  (From Isolation Canyon Climbing Guide by Manuel Rangel - #58 in book)
content.location: Located a few feet right of Mananero.  Rappel from pine tree or walk back down (left)  and rappel Hijo Del-Mar.

content.description: Getting off the ground to a slot was the crux. The rock leans to the left, has great friction and requires committment to start.  It takes a great medium nut then good pro for the rest.
content.location: far right of winter wall just right of a small tower.

content.description: Cold shuts on ledge three feet back from edge of wall to get to start. Up dihedral and traverse left to roof and two bolts above. Cold Shuts (From Isolation Canyon Climbing Guide by Manuel Rangel - #51 pg 36)   This has the same start as No Motion but then goes left at the roof to the obvious bolts above.  Follow the two bolts on the face straight up to the cold shuts on the ledge above (set about three feet back)
content.protection: Single rack to #3.  Extendable draws will help with drag.

content.description: Climb the crack, using mostly horizontal gear placements to a dihedral. Stem and climb the dihedral to the cold shuts on the ledge. Crux is dealing with pine tree branches at the start of the route.
content.location: This route and "out of the pines" start below the finktion wall ledge. You will see two cold shuts below ordinary bypass. Rap down and you will see the two bolts on the face for the "out of the pines" variation

content.description: Very fun route. Stay left of bolts for fun moves. Easy climbing right of bolts.
content.location: Right under Finktion Wall. Locate the chains to rappel to bottom of climb. Under the route Tropical People and Deadbolt.

content.description: Head up the right of two vertical cracks. Climbs horizontals to cracks then over small roof.
content.protection: Standard trad rack. Cold shuts at top.
